channel.title: Xo Scape Staff and Development
channel.description:
Hello, Im Xo Stab,
I will be starting a server soon called Xo Scape. I really need some people to help test out server bases and staff.
--Staff--
Admins and Mods will be free, but im not handing them out. If you show me that you can handle being a admin/mod and help out the server you can become one.
--Testers--
If you wanna help out testing the server please respond.
--Donations--
You can donate if you want. Rember donations will be only really runescape accounts becasuse of the new runescape rule.
Thanks,
Xo Stab
[IMG]http://i230.photobucket.com/albums/ee147/sheepie_1_ttyl/xoscapesig1.jpg[/img]
This server wil be hamachi untill i figure out the whole no-ip mumbojumbo lol if you wanna test it and dont have hamachi download at: www.hamachi.cc
I am also looking for a client base also that has all silab items, but not the silab client, the webclient and 4.0 download doesn't work for me, if you can help me with that too.
Email- xoscape@live.com Website-Not created yet (coming soon)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2008, 02:12:48 PM[/size][hr]I also create client backgrounds and sigs =p

item.title: Xo Scape Staff and Development

item.description:

Hello, Im Xo Stab,

I will be starting a server soon called Xo Scape. I really need some people to help test out server bases and staff.
